headline: FactSet (FDS): Evaluating Valuation After a 40% Share Price Pullback
summary: Recent performance puts FactSet in context FactSet Research Systems (FDS) has been grinding through a mixed stretch, with the stock down about 40 % over the past year even as revenue and net income keep growing at mid single digit rates. See our latest analysis for FactSet Research Systems. Over the past year, FactSet’s share price return of roughly negative 39 percent and 1 year total shareholder return of about negative 40 percent show how sentiment has cooled.
